input:
Job Title: Software Engineer
Job Description: Equifax is seeking creative, high-energy and driven software engineers with hands-on development skills to work on a variety of meaningful projects. You are ideal for this position if you are a forward-thinking, committed, and enthusiastic software engineer who is passionate about technology.

output.Job Summary: Creative, driven software engineer to work on impactful projects with modern technologies.

input:
Job Title: Software Engineer
Job Description: Perform general application development activities including unit testing, code deployment to development environment and technical documentation. Works on unfamiliar code written by team members. Participates in estimation, planning, and diagnosing performance issues.

Job Title: Software Engineer
Job Description: Work with modern software development practices including serverless computing, microservices architecture, CI/CD pipelines, and infrastructure-as-code. Participate in agile teams and roadmap planning.

Job Title: Software Engineer
Job Description: Must have 2+ years experience with Java, Python, JavaScript, Maven or Gradle, HTML, CSS. Experience in software testing, performance analysis and quality engineering strategies. Cloud exposure with GCP, AWS, or Azure.

Job Title: Software Engineer
Job Description: Preferred skills include UI development using Angular and Bootstrap, backend frameworks like SpringBoot, familiarity with Git, Atlassian tools such as JIRA, and databases like MySQL or SQL Server. Cloud certification is a plus.
